item.description:
The December 18 meeting will be at Cafe Paradiso. Venite & parlate italiano -- e' un posto bello per conversazione con caffe, vino e cibo! Questo posto e' molto simpatico.

Cara is going to bring a game called Snatch - its a word game similar to Scrabble, and we will try to play it in Italian.

Please try to RSVP one way or another. I won't hold you to it, but your RSVP helps others decide to make the effort to come out and also helps me find out which members are really interested.

a prossima, Warren

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: December 18, Italian Meetup - fun and games
